rows.label: qst502018_msg0001
rows.name: Hey, lady! Get a load of this!

rows.label: qst502018_msg0002
rows.name:
Apparently light and sound travel at
different speeds! Can you believe that?!

rows.label: qst502018_msg0003
rows.name: Oh? That's pretty interesting.

rows.label: qst502018_msg0004
rows.name:
It's true! I read it in a book!
Although...I'm still not sure I believe it.

rows.label: qst502018_msg0005
rows.name:
It was a pretty cheap old book.
They probably just made it up.

rows.label: qst502018_msg0006
rows.name: ...Maybe we could test it out?

rows.label: qst502018_msg0007
rows.name:
Like, an experiment?!
Can you do that?!

rows.label: qst502018_msg0008
rows.name:
I'll stand somewhere far away and
make a thunderbolt. Then you check if
you see and hear it at different times!

rows.label: qst502018_msg0009
rows.name: Sounds like fun!

rows.label: qst502018_msg0010
rows.name:
Okay, hang on. I'll go outside the village.
You wait right here!

rows.label: qst502018_msg0011
rows.name: Whoa, that's amazing!

rows.label: qst502018_msg0012
rows.name:
The sound really did come later!
Light must be faster than sound!

rows.label: qst502018_msg0013
rows.name:
You're pretty amazing, you know that?
That thunderbolt was so perfect for
this experiment!

rows.label: qst502018_msg0014
rows.name: Heheheh... I'm glad I could help.

rows.label: qst502018_msg0015
rows.name: Yeah! Thanks!

rows.label: qst502018_msg0016
rows.name: She's sure taking her time...

rows.label: qst502018_msg0017
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: qst502018_msg0018
rows.name: Nothing's happening...

rows.label: qst502018_msg0019
rows.name:
I'm sorry... I don't seem to be able
to summon a decent lightning bolt
right now.

rows.label: qst502018_msg0020
rows.name:
Hey, that's okay! Let me know when
you're feeling more confident!
